attributes.action: Stop cutting benefits for the most vunerable in our society.
attributes.additional_details: To the Honourable the Commons of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland in Parliament assembled. The Humble petition of Andrew Gordon Sheweth That some of the most vunerable people in our society are having their benefits cut by the Department for Work and Pensions even though they are unfit for work . Wherefore your petitioners prays that your honourable House consider that benefits for the most vunerable in our society should not be cut if they are indeed unfit for work. And your petitioners, as in duty bound, will ever pray, &c.
